website_summaries.verdict: Coming from the long line of Puma’s Smash series, the Smash Cat L is packed with style and comfort. Its classic tennis shoe profile makes this a great piece for everyday wear and suited for most occasions. It is highly suggested to pick a size up for the perfect fit.
pros: Many users say that it is among the Puma sneakers that are very comfortable
A couple of wearers are impressed by the cushiony footbed of the Puma Smash Cat L
Several have commended the sneakers’ versatility
Incorporating it even on the work wardrobe is possible
Among the Puma Smash sneakers, it has a versatile design that perfect for everyday wear, according to a couple of users
A good number of people express their appreciation of the shoe’s stylish silhouette
One user adores how these sneakers are a cross between a walking and athletic shoe
The Puma Smash Cat L has a great quality, according to several shoppers
Several purchasers are happy because they receive compliments every time they sport the stylish sneaker
cons: A couple of users have noted that the Puma Smash Cat L runs a bit narrow
Some testers wish that these have more arch support
It is available in a limited colorway, according to a customer

customer_reviews.title: other than that an excellent sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9.5 had to order a 10 . . . other than that an excellent sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: ChefTompkins

customer_reviews.title: 5 is typically perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a more narrow and low cut sneaker than all other Puma's I've owned. Size 5.5 is typically perfect for me, though the Smash Cat runs quite small. I exchanged them for a size 6 and they feel better, though will still need some breaking in to stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Very confortable. Quality sneakers. I very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft leather. Nice feeling sneaker. Love the stitched puma on the shoe. Didnt expect this from Puma. Puma the only tennis shoe for me from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Wideguyz

customer_reviews.title: Really good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as described and they look great.Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great condition. Showed up in original PUMA packaging. As described and photo'd.
customer_reviews.author: J.Smith AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Get it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe... Fits perfect & looks great. Happy shopper here:)
customer_reviews.author: delly_thajamaican

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look good however not as expected
customer_reviews.text: the box came totally damaged. The shoes look good however not as expected, good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes too
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes too....love ALL my PUMAS! As most PUMAS are however, they're small. These are NOT as small as the driving shoes are though. I get lots of comments on these. For shoes on a guy, that's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my tennis well comfortable the zay perfect and original described excellent as the seller says thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cotumo serv

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SNEAKERS!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SNEAKERS! Ordered these to replace size 9.0 POLO leather sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo57

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and I get compliments all the time of the look of the shoes. Kaos
customer_reviews.author: Kaos

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fit alright but there are some minor imperfect ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit alright but there are some minor imperfect stitch lines, untrimmed material and short shoe laces. The seller did not make any effort to compensate for that so I have to return it. Also, I was a bit surprised to find the identical shoes in the local discount shop for $34.99.
customer_reviews.author: Secretly Angry Cat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have asked for anything better! The shoes fit as expected, are comfortable to walk and moreover got them at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sagar Kalburgi

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Puma Smash Cat L-M Puma Smash Cat L
product_meta.description: PUMA smash cat l is a new take on the classic PUMA tennis style. With an embroidered PUMA cat on both quarters and a soft genuine leather upper this classic tennis silhouette is made for every day.
